 " hey,i was just lookin at the shogun page,hahaha coincidentally did 
you know that
mr hayes,was actually an actor in the original movie shogun?"

Well, Hayes CLAIMS he was, anyway. He is uncredited and the detailed 
list of cast & crew (including stunt personnel) I have gives no mention 
of him. The only other place I've ever seen it mentioned was in an 
interview with Hayes (of course) in Kick magazine back in the 80's 
where among other things he claims to have been living in Japan for 
years, given the Shogun production crew ninja history and choreography 
for the ninja attack sequence, and just totally impressed the whole 
crew with his grasp of Japanese history and martial arts. The part he 
was supposed to have played was a stuntman part-the crewman that falls 
off the mast of the Erasmus into the ocean.
Perhaps some clever Japanese solution to get rid of the 
gaijin 'expert'...
